net.sourceforge.jnipp.proxyGen
Class CPPProxyImplGenerator

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.jnipp.proxyGen.CPPProxyImplGenerator
public class CPPProxyImplGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

C++ proxy class implementation file generator. This class is responsible for generating the C++ proxy implementation file for a specified Java class. The specifics of the code generation process are guided by the settings supplied in the call to the generate() method.

Version:
$Revision: 1.40 $
Author:
$Author: ptrewhella $

Field Detail

proxyGenSettings

private ProxyGenSettings proxyGenSettings
Settings specifying the code generation options. This reference points to the ProxyGenSettings instance passed into the generate() method and is used by various methods to guide the code generation.
See Also:
generate(net.sourceforge.jnipp.common.ClassNode, net.sourceforge.jnipp.project.ProxyGenSettings)

Defualt constructor.
Method Detail

generate

public void generate(ClassNode root,
                     ProxyGenSettings proxyGenSettings)
              throws java.io.IOException
Public entry point. This method is called to begin the code generation process for the specified Java class. This method will call one or more of the private helper methods to perform the various code generation tasks.
Parameters:
root - The ClassNode instance referencing the Java class for which we are generating code.
proxyGenSettings - The settings used to obtain the code generation options.
Throws:
java.io.IOException -  

generateIncludes

public void generateIncludes(ClassNode root,
                             FormattedFileWriter writer)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Private helper method to generate the requisite #include statements. This method is called by the generate() method to generate the #include statements that will be needed to compile the generated C++ proxy class.
Parameters:
root - The ClassNode instance referencing the Java class for which we are generating code.
writer - The FormattedFileWriter instance where all output is directed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException -  
See Also:
generate(net.sourceforge.jnipp.common.ClassNode, net.sourceforge.jnipp.project.ProxyGenSettings)

public void generateUsing(ClassNode root,
                          FormattedFileWriter writer)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Private helper method to generate the requisite using statements. This method is called by the generate() method to generate the using statements that will be needed to compile the generated C++ proxy class.
Parameters:

writer - The FormattedFileWriter instance where all output is directed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException -

generateCtors

private void generateCtors(ClassNode root,
                           FormattedFileWriter writer)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Private helper method to generate the constructors for the generated C++ proxy class. This method is called by the generate() method to generate the constructors for the generated C++ proxy class. A constructor will be generated for each constructor found in the corresponding Java class.
Parameters:
root - The ClassNode instance referencing the Java class for which we are generating code.
writer - The FormattedFileWriter instance where all output is directed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException -  
See Also:
generate(net.sourceforge.jnipp.common.ClassNode, net.sourceforge.jnipp.project.ProxyGenSettings)

generateGetters

private void generateGetters(ClassNode root,
                             FormattedFileWriter writer)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Private helper method to generate the attribute "getters" for the generated C++ proxy class. This method is called by the generate() method to generate the field accessors for the generated C++ proxy class. A "getter" will optionally be generated for each field found in the corresponding Java class. This option is specified in the supplied settings.
Parameters:
root - The ClassNode instance referencing the Java class for which we are generating code.
writer - The FormattedFileWriter instance where all output is directed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException -  
See Also:
generate(net.sourceforge.jnipp.common.ClassNode, net.sourceforge.jnipp.project.ProxyGenSettings), net.sourceforge.jnipp.project

generateSetters

private void generateSetters(ClassNode root,
                             FormattedFileWriter writer)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Private helper method to generate the attribute "setters" for the generated C++ proxy class. This method is called by the generate() method to generate the field mutators for the generated C++ proxy class. A "setter" will optionally be generated for each field found in the corresponding Java class. This option is specified in the supplied settings.
Parameters:
root - The ClassNode instance referencing the Java class for which we are generating code.
writer - The FormattedFileWriter instance where all output is directed.
Throws:
java.io.IOException -  
See Also:
generate(net.sourceforge.jnipp.common.ClassNode, net.sourceforge.jnipp.project.ProxyGenSettings), net.sourceforge.jnipp.project

generateMethods

private void generateMethods(ClassNode root,
                             FormattedFileWriter writer)
                      throws java.io.IOException
Private helper method to generate the methods for the generated C++ proxy class. This method is called by the generate() method to generate the methods for the generated C++ proxy class. A method will be generated for each method found in the corresponding Java class.
Parameters:
root - The ClassNode instance referencing the Java class for which we are generating code.
writer - The FormattedFileWriter instance where all output is directed.
Throws:
